title: Ultimate Robo Duel 3D

content.developer: Ultimate Robo Duel 3D was developed by RHM Interactive.

fullContent: Homeâ€º CombatUltimate Robo Duel 3DBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenAre you ready to enter a world of mechanical marvels? Ultimate Robo Duel 3D is an action game where you will participate in wrestling matches between robots. Unlike regular wrestling matches, here you will fight with your opponent in the shoes of a high-tech robot.Of course, as you can guess, your opponent will also be made of metal. In this battle game, you can play against the AI, progress level by level or duel with a friend in two-player mode!Basics of Ultimate Robo Duel 3DIt is possible to wrestle with robots in the 21st century with Ultimate Robo Duel 3D!Before entering the boxing arena, start by choosing the game mode you want to play.You can fight with a robot controlled by an AI in Battle mode.2 Player mode will allow you to duel with your friend in the wrestling arena.Career mode allows you to make progress by leveling up.In all three modes, your main aim is to fight with your opponent by kicking, punching, hitting and grabbing him.This action game has various actions to take while trying to destroy the rival metal.The Golden AtomicYou can find many high-tech robot characters in Ultimate Robo Duel 3D. But if this is your first time playing this battle game, you will start with the Golden Atomic. When you enter the wrestling arena, you must perform all the attacking styles to knock down your opponent.Punch your rival in the face or kick him, aiming for his legs. You can send bullets or use the Special Hit to hurt him tremendously. Don't forget to check your rival's and your health bars. Whoever's bar drops to zero first is defeated!Unlock New Giant RobotsAs you win battles, you will earn money. You can use this money to unlock new powerful robot characters. Each mechanic creature has unique battery power, bullet force and warm-up time. Consider these features before acquiring one of them. We will leave you the names of some of these metal marvels below!Double Kill (Cost: 750)Hell Bot (Cost: 1000)Twinc City (Cost: 1250)Hitman (Cost: 1500)Night Machine (Cost: 1750)ControlsPlayer 1WASD Keys: MoveT: BulletF/G: PunchH: Special HitC/V: KickB: GrabPlayer 2Arrow Keys: MoveM: BulletU/I: PunchO: Special HitJ/K: KickL: GrabDeveloperUltimate Robo Duel 3D was developed by RHM Interactive.Similar Online GamesIf you enjoy wrestling games, you may also try playing Get on Top. In the game, you will wrestle with your opponent by controlling your stickman. If you make your opponent's head hit the ground, you will win the round!Another option for robot fans is playing Mech Shooter, engaging in robot wars, and taking down mechanical opponents.We are constantly trying to expand our game range. If you have any suggestions or a wish list, please contact us!This article was updated on April 19, 20242 Player3DActionArenaBattleCombatCrazyFreeSportsUnityWeapon
